title: Home Repair Materials Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of common home repair and building materials. From drywall to insulation, how much do you know?

questions.question: What is drywall (also called sheetrock or gypsum board) made of?
options: A core of gypsum plaster sandwiched between paper facings

questions.question: Which pink or yellow fluffy material is commonly installed in walls and attics for thermal insulation?
What is joint compound (mud) used for in home repair?
options: Covering drywall seams, nail holes, and tape to create a smooth wall surface

questions.question: Which material is a thin, flat piece of wood or asphalt used to cover roofs in overlapping rows?
What is grout used for?
options: Filling the gaps between tiles to seal and finish the installation

questions.question: Which building material is a composite panel made of thin wood layers (plies) glued together with alternating grain directions?
What is flashing used for on a roof?
options: Directing water away from joints and seams to prevent leaks

questions.question: Which product is a pre-mixed or powder compound used to fill cracks in concrete?
What is the purpose of drywall tape used along seams?
options: Reinforcing joints between drywall sheets to prevent cracking

questions.question: Which waterproof membrane is installed behind shower tiles to prevent water damage?
options: Cement board with waterproof membrane (like Kerdi)

questions.question: What is thinset mortar used for?
options: Bonding tiles to floors and walls

questions.question: Which material is a flexible strip applied around windows and doors to block drafts and moisture?
What is the standard thickness of most interior residential drywall in the United States?
Which expanding foam product is sprayed into gaps and cracks around windows and pipes to seal and insulate?
What is cement board used for?
options: Providing a water-resistant backer for tile in wet areas like showers
